mapper.select: select admitBuyid,manageperson,firstpay,admitbuydate,clientName,sex,cardnumber, phone,fromtmoney,adviserName,mustprices,sumprices,houseName,payWayName from admitbuy a,schedule s,house h ,client c,adviser ad,payway p WHERE a.scheduleid=s.scheduleid and a.houseid=h.houseid and a.clientid=c.clientid and a.adviserid=ad.adviserid and a.paywayid=p.paywayid
